title: PureVPN Introduces WireGuard Protocol for their Fastest Speeds Ever
content:
One of the best VPN solutions just got even better, with the implementation of a protocol that will drastically improve your speeds. On December 8 of 2021, PureVPN switched to the WireGuard protocol to minimize speed degradation, making your internet traffic faster and more secure than ever. The new WireGuard protocol is now available on

The post PureVPN Introduces WireGuard Protocol for their Fastest Speeds Ever appeared first on xda-developers.
